What to Do

Ensure that your application is free of cross-site scripting issues (CWE-79), because most CSRF defenses can be bypassed using attacker-controlled scripts.

Additional Resources

  • For more information about "CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')", please see http://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/79.html
